title: Eclipse COMPLAINTS?
content:
Okay, yes, the eclipse was pretty cool, but we werenâ€™t in the path of totality (we were at like 96%), so I didnâ€™t have the Transcendent Experience that some have described. I mean, it was definitely neat. And we did get cute pictures. And it does sort of feel like a little gremlin has been set loose in my soul. But my neck was also sore the day after. Worth it???
